info: I’m an independent <meme-link target="memes" src="https://picsum.photos/500?gravity=west">User Interface and Experience Designer</meme-link>based in Bangalore, India.

Primarily engaging with startups, I try to design <meme-link target="memes" src="https://picsum.photos/500?gravity=south">beautiful, functional products and systems</meme-link>. I believe in developing long-lasting relationships with my clients to ensure design plays its role as a great <meme-link target="memes" src="https://picsum.photos/500?gravity=north">value-add</meme-link> to their businesses.
I would love to hear from you over email.
